changeSet.comment: Delete all auto-generated Concepts Yes/No Concept Names for True/False Concept. These Yes/No Concepts are reliably generated with IDs 1 and 2 and random UUID. The random UUID prevents them from being useful, referenced from Concept packages.

concept_id = 2 and name = 'Não' and locale = 'pt' and uuid != '126361BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB'

changeSet.author: Connect for Life
changeSet.comment: Fix Risk factor for HIV Concepts. Makes Concept Names with 'en-GB' locale (if any exist) a Fully Specified Names for Concepts which have no Fully Specified Name defined.
changeSet.sql: update concept_name as cn_en inner join concept as c on c.concept_id = cn_en.concept_id left join concept_name as cn_fsn on cn_fsn.concept_id = c.concept_id and cn_fsn.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' set cn_en.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' where cn_en.concept_name_type is null and cn_en.locale = 'en-GB' and cn_fsn.concept_name_id is null
